reactogon

Class Pulse

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactogon.Pulse

  • public class Pulse
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pulse(Node n, Node previousN, SoundSequencer ss, int direction)
      Creates a new pulse, this is useful for the when an explosion tile is used, or a pulse that is created mid play
      Pulse(Node n, SoundSequencer ss, int direction)
      Creates a new pulse, this is useful for the first pulse created by the play button

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pulse

        public Pulse(Node n,
     SoundSequencer ss,
     int direction)
        Creates a new pulse, this is useful for the first pulse created by the play button
        Parameters:
        n - holds the current position (in the form of a node) in the hexCell
        ss - passes the sound sequecner (this may not be needed in the future)
        direction - the direction the pulse is going

      • Pulse

        public Pulse(Node n,
     Node previousN,
     SoundSequencer ss,
     int direction)
        Creates a new pulse, this is useful for the when an explosion tile is used, or a pulse that is created mid play
        Parameters:
        n - holds the current position (in the form of a node) in the hexCell
        ss - passes the sound sequecner (this may not be needed in the future)
        previousN - can take a previous value if it has one
        direction - the direction the pulse is going
